# Wing Structural Analysis - Formula Reference

## FLIGHT SCIENCE INPUT PARAMETERS
- **FS**: Front spar
- **RS**: Rear spar
- **C_m**: Pitching moment coefficient [-]
- **AR**: Aspect ratio [-]
- **Î»**: Taper ratio [-]
- **V_c**: Flight velocity [m/s]
- **n**: Load factor [-]
- **S_ref**: Wing planform area [mÂ²]
- **W_0**: Estimated MTOW [N]
- **Ï**: Air density [kg/mÂ³]
- **x_ac**: Aerodynamic center position [%]
- **Î›_ac**: Sweep angle from aerodynamic center [deg]

## ACCEPTANCE CONDITIONS

### Stress Interaction (with Safety Factor)
```
(Ïƒ_FS / Ïƒ_allow) + (Ï„_FS / Ï„_allow)Â² < 1
```

### Area Conditions
